title: # 299 - Zach Bitter & ME
description:
Today I sit down with endurance athlete and coach Zach Bitter. Zach is a world and American record holder - Three time national champion - world 100 km for team USA. 

Check out Zach's podcast the "Human Performance Outliers Podcast" and more at zachbitter.com

This episode is brought to you by Hims. A one stop shop for hair loss, skincare, sexual wellness, for men. To get started for just $5 go to www.forhims.com/bertcast

This episode is also brought to you by Policy Genius. Compare life insurance policies and more in just 5 min at www.policygenius.com 

This episode is also brought to you by Birddogs shorts. Enter promo code “Bertcast” and get a free Dad Hat at www.birddogs.com 

Laughable is the best rated podcast App in the world. Laughable is a great way to find new comedians and podcasts you love. Just search for “laughable” in the App Store and download today!

For all TOUR DATE & MERCH click HERE: http://www.bertbertbert.com
